title: New: Mmoths – For Her (Feat. Young & Sick)
content:
Well this is a side to Mmoths we haven’t heard before.

Stripping right back to basics, and relying on the vocals of LA’s Young & Sick, it’s a marked progression, shifting the focus from the dreaded ‘beat-scene’ and instead shaping a track that’s by far his most elegant to date. Check out For Her below and keep it locked for his next EP, Diaries, out 5 March. (Premiered via The Fader)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
